website_summaries.verdict: A nice compromise if you're having trouble finding a memory foam mattress that's not too hard or too soft.
pros: Gel layer helps maintain a comfortable temperature
cons: Takes up to four days to fully inflate and air out

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware - the manufacturer changed the mattress?
customer_reviews.text: Initially the first mattress we got was amazing. Then one side started to dip in relatively quickly and we asked for a replacement via the warranty. The replacement was rock hard and not at all like the first. The company kept insisting it was the same mattress. My guess is that most of the good reviews are from 2016 and older, and that they changed the mattress to correct the continuous "dipping" problem I've seen others have. The problem is that the newer model is way too hard and not at all what we were initially happy with.
customer_reviews.author: Jarod & Adria

customer_reviews.title: which causes me to overheat in the night and sweat like I'm in a Finnish sauna
customer_reviews.text: I'll tell you what: this bed is a real turd. I sink deeply into it, which causes me to overheat in the night and sweat like I'm in a Finnish sauna; and it gives no back support. I've had it for about five months, and the sweating, even though I constantly am changing the bedding, has left it smelling like the gym socks that get lost in your football locker at the beginning of the season. And I'm talking about what they smell like in late October.... Take a pass on this POS!
customer_reviews.author: J Ross Merlot

customer_reviews.title: Best mattress ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have been sleeping on this mattress for about 6 months now. We "retired" a multiple $thousand name-brand mattress that wore out after 12 years. This Arctic Dreams Cooling Gel Mattress is hands down the most comfortable mattress we have used in almost 40 years of marriage. It is comfortable for both side and back sleeping. My wife also likes that it is light enough she can lift it when changing sheets. We've highly recommended it to friends and received "best mattress ever!" comments after they have purchased and used their's. And we've also purchased one for out houseboat. And I love that it is "made in USA".
customer_reviews.author: Redrock Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Fat man tested, fat man approved.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this mattress for a year now and i love it. I'm 6 feet tall at 300 pounds and live in southeastern Louisiana where heat and humidity are bad during much of the year and this is by far the most comfortable mattress I've ever bought. No issues with heat like many foam mattresses. Even with my extra weight it's comfy and durable. I'm thinking of buying one soon as a spare for when this one does wear out, especially since it comes in such a relatively small box.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: No memorry and definitely not cool...
customer_reviews.text: This is just a foam mattress. Why they call these Memory or Cooling Gel, is beside me. I guess they use these terms to make the mattress sound smart and suffisticated/technologically advanced. They have no memory and they are definitely not cool. Unless you are 50 pound or less, this will sagg and make you uncomfortable. Also this thing does not breath and will make you sweat profusely especially in the summer. I will never ever buy a memory foam cool gel mattess again. It's just a gimmick and play of words! Buy a spring supported mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Ama Zona

customer_reviews.title: Bad backaches every time you lie on it
customer_reviews.text: Bought it 3 yrs ago, every time assumed it was me, now everyone - me, my wife, 6 yr old every one who used this mattress has immediately had backache next morning. Worst money spent. Also heats up over night We bought LUCID Comfort Collection 10-inch Gel Memory Foam Mattress - Multiple Options Twin Firm 10 Inches Mattress Only - 2 yrs ago; Its fantastic for every one. soft cooling and doesnt build up heat in the night. We bought it in 2016, very expensive so kept using it blaming myself, still same issues with backache - finally getting rid of it and buying another LUCID.
customer_reviews.author: Bun

customer_reviews.title: Terrible for heavy people
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have had this bed for less than three months, and my side of the bed is already completely broken in and very uncomfortable. It's like sleeping in a padded ditch. The middle of the bed, between my spot and his spot, is still reasonably comfortable, but it's like rolling up a hill to get out of my indentation to the center of the bed. If you or your partner weighs over 200 pounds, this bed is a bad choice for you.
customer_reviews.author: Christin Clatterbuck

customer_reviews.title: More or less what I would expect from a brand new $250 mattress
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Comfortable to sleep on. Very soft but not saggy soft. The mattress itself feels like a pillow top, kind of cushy. I bought this mattress based off of all the great reviews, and for $250 it was a great choice. Cons: When you sit on the edges of the bed, it sinks. Feels smaller than a standard queen bed (maybe because it sinks on edges) I was super worried about the fact that the bed sinks when you sit on the edges, and still am. I'm not sure if that is normal. Not a sitting mattress. Leave sitting for the chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2 years ago
customer_reviews.text: Bought it in September 2016 and at first the mattress was wonderful. Almost a year after buying it, I broke down the side constantly getting out of bed to go to the bathroom and having my huge pregnant belly resting on it. Now at 2 years later, my husband's side has done the same. Unless you lay perfectly in the middle, you feel like you're going to roll out of bed. There are no measurable divets, but man are they there. The sides won't even hold up our 10 pound dog without giving way. Beyond disappointed and now looking for a new bed.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Jameson

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and support you.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress the end of Jan 2018. The first night I slept on it was heavenly! I am over 65 and have arthritis in my back, shoulders and other areas as well. I have been supported perfectly. It is not too soft nor too hard. I can not recommend this product highly enough. I recently has Rotator cuff surgery and was concerned I might not be comfortable sleeping in bed. I had also purchased two wedge pillows as sleeping flat on my back is very uncomforable. I have not been uncomfortable a single night. I did not know I could be so comfortable, even after surgery! Barbara Myrick
customer_reviews.author: Barbara S Myrick

customer_reviews.title: Great at first.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in 2016 because of the price and the great reviews. We liked it initially but it did not take long before it became lumpy. I have never had back pain in the past but if I stay in this bed for very long I have to get up because my back and neck hurt so bad, the same for my husband. I don't normally write reviews but I felt that I needed to write one on this mattress because I bought it due to the great reviews. I cannot recommend this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: pam harris

customer_reviews.title: Lives Up To Its "Arctic Dreams" Name!
customer_reviews.text: I said I'd never purchase a mattress without trying it out first but after doing some research I was won over by the good reviews and the fact that it could be delivered to my front door. I'm SOOOO glad I made this purchase! This mattress is so comfortable. I'm a 50-something-year-old woman who has "sleep issues," including getting too warm at night and waking up with back and/or hip pain. But, so far, this lives up to its "Arctic Dreams" name!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Alexander

customer_reviews.title: I love my bed
customer_reviews.text: I'm about a buck 130 and I feel this bed is great. I don't believe this bed is good for sitting on the side of it for very long because of how it sinks but then again a bed isn't made for sitting on. When resting on the bed I get supreme feeling of comfort and I'm able to sleep as good as possible. If you want to improve your life it starts with your sleep and this bed will help deliver. I thought the packaging was wonderful especially for someone moving into a difficult to reach area these types of beds are great for moving in but moving out is another game.
customer_reviews.author: EL

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress at any price
customer_reviews.text: Have had ours 2 years now and it is still like new. Every bit as good or superior to the high dollar mattresses. I am a side sleeper and am fully supported comfortably. It only takes a night or two to adjust to the mattress it is firm. but you feel it conforming to your body for support very comfortable ....love it Side support is excellent - we have it on a platform . I'd buy another no matter the price if anything happens to this one We have one of the bamboo mattress covers (about 20.00 from amazon also) on it
customer_reviews.author: Tennessee John

customer_reviews.title: Defective and they don't seem to care
customer_reviews.text: It. never fully inflated/expanded after purchase in March. Gave it time and its getting even worse! Feels like I am rolling of my bed because of the slant. Sent pics to seller over a month ago and they don't seem to care. Now waking up with a painful back!
customer_reviews.author: Karlene B

customer_reviews.title: I have gotten a great night sleep every night
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about it's firmness, thought it would be way too firm. Even though it is firm, I have gotten a great night sleep every night, so that is a nice surprise. I thought sure that I might not like it, but I actually am very pleased and like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: I am an alien
customer_reviews.text: This really is a well constructed mattress . Decompressed in a matter of seconds . Got the queen rv for my bedroom . It is very comfy . Perhaps just a little soft for a medium . I am a big guy . 5'10" 3 00 lbs . I've had this for a few months now and have broken it in . It has gotten a tad softer but still kept its shape . Still this mattress has given me some great rest at night and I'm happy that I bought this mattress .
customer_reviews.author: Tom S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for back sleepers, not so much for side sleepers.
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so I've had this for about a week now. I must say, it has been really good for my back as it is very supportive. I think this is a great mattress for back sleepers. When I sleep on my side, my hips and shoulders hurt on the side I'm lying on. It is a bit disappointing as I was really encouraged by the reviews. Bottom line: I think this mattress would be perfect for someone who sleeps on their back and/or is not overweight. Side sleepers, especially if you are much overweight, it's probably no the right mattress...
customer_reviews.author: Cap'n

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of difficulty with insomnia so I thought buying a new mattress might help. I sleep on my side and sometimes wake up with a stiff neck in the morning. I took a chance on this mattress based on the reviews. Didn't want to spend $1,000 but was willing to pay a bit more to get one made in the USA. I was very pleased at how quickly it got to full height after unrolling it. Measured a bit more than 10 inches within a couple of hours. No discernible odor. Just right in terms of softness/support. I am really happy and recommend this mattress for a reasonable price and great comfort.
customer_reviews.author: E. Curran

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy, mattress build has changed
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers have mentioned, it seems like the seller has changed the foam in this mattress. We recently purchased a king after sleeping wonderfully on the queen for year and couldn't make it through 1 night. It feels nothing like the queen, seems as though it is filled with cheap block foam. Seller stopped responding after our first message but Amazon refunded us immediately after filing a claim.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST I HAVE EVER HAD IN 72 YEARS
customer_reviews.text: Love this mattress.The one we replaced cost $2300 + change. It never was as nice as this, only lasted12 years before couldn't stand it anymore, sagging. Lumpy, totally bad. This new Artic foam is everything they said and more. Very comfortable with excellent support in any position. I was concerned about heat build-up because of foam. Not an issue, actually cooler than old mattress. I really can't think of any downside At absolute worst case if it only lasted two years I could buy 9 new ones lasting 18 years and still be ahead of what the other one cost + lasting longer. I highly recommend this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: dab92376

customer_reviews.title: Firmer than described
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT a medium, but more firm of a mattress. I sleep both on my back (VERY comfortable with this mattress) and my side (NOT that comfortable) typically. I was expecting a more soft mattress, being foam, but it's rather firm. Comfortable, and cool. I did add a slightly padded cover and that helped for side sleeping, but took away the cooling feature that we really need. Shipped well and ready to use within a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress as a replacement to the 10 year old original unit that came with my RV. And while almost anything would have been an improvement over what I had this mattress has been fantastic as of yet. Truthfully this mattress has been one of my favorite mattresses to date. I sleep through the night without tossing and turning and wake up with no pain or discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew Threadgill

customer_reviews.title: A Memory Foam Mattress From Heaven
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely...love this mattress, it was an excellent decision. I've slept on spiral-coil mattresses all my life, even as a child, no more spring mattresses for me! I can't tell you how much better I feel when I awake in the morning...I lift weights weekly and I don't have the back and elbow aches anymore. Fed-Ex delivered real fast...came in under 5 days and was somewhat heavy approx. 100lbs plus, removed box and plastic then unfolded it on the bed frame, comes flat but watch out...mattress raises fast and completes in 24 to 36 hours. It took a few weeks for the plastic smell to leave, "Febreze Spray" will help eliminate that smell, but overall...it's a mattress from Heaven.
customer_reviews.author: Wm.Scott

customer_reviews.title: Nearly like new after 3 years!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress in early 2016. I waited till now, end of 2018 to write this review, because I did not want to write something based on a new customer-new product experience. After almost 3 years, I cann tell you that it is doing perfectly fine. No loss of shape. No odours. No change in confort. Not discoloration etc. all good. As good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Abhishek Kumar

customer_reviews.title: So far so good...
customer_reviews.text: Night 1= great night sleep with the boyfriend, whom I normally can’t sleep with because he moves a lot-didn’t feel him move last night much at all(could of been the drinks we had before bed too though)... none the less- my back hurt less! I sure hope this lasts!!! Hopefully update in a few months with same great review! 🙏🏻
customer_reviews.author: CLA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect softness and lasts
customer_reviews.text: Best ever. Comfortable first night out of the box. I like a soft mattress and this one is perfect! If the mattress is too hard, my legs actually go to sleep — this never happens with this mattress. The cooling aspect is OK, and the cover is very comfortable. I paid $250 For this mattress in 2017 and it is much better than the expensive Sealy cocoon I wasted money on.
customer_reviews.author: Lil MamaKitty

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: I had no problems with this whatsoever. I had bought my son a smaller size and after falling asleep on his bed one night I couldn't go back to my mattress! I had to get one for myself. And I did! This helped with back pain I was having, I didn't realize how bad it was until I woke up pain a free! I wasnt sure how the firmness would work out for me, but it is firm in a supportive way, not an uncomfortable way. I did hours of research before purchasing for my son and this won in the end. I appreciate it is made in the USA!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Browne

customer_reviews.title: Bought the Short Queen for our new camper and it was a perfect fit to replace the stock mattress
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed! Bought the Short Queen for our new camper and it was a perfect fit to replace the stock mattress. My wife suffers from chronic pain and absolutely must have a good mattress. She sleeps much more comfortably on this mattress than she does on the high dollar Sterns and Foster set we have in our bedroom. Unbelievable! Depending on how well this holds up over time, we likely won't be going to the mattress store for new mattresses in the future...
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Looks very nice, looks and feels like money
customer_reviews.text: WOW! I am impressed. Little or no smell. Looks very nice, looks and feels like money. Very good materials and finish. Sleeps VERY well. I am 6'3" 220lbs, DW is 5'7" 130lbs. we both really enjoy this mattress. it has a couple inches of cushy 'give' with nice support under that. Importantly: it sleeps 'nice & cool'! Our old memory foam mattress was comfy but we (especially me) would be very hot and uncomfortable; hot on the mattress side and cold on top! crazy. This mattress is much better. Very comfortable, we are sleeping well! recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Croy

customer_reviews.title: Great Comfort. Great Reliability. Great Price.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this mattress just a little over two years and am still very satisfied with my purchase. It has held up quite well and is easy to turn, flip, and rotate as need be. When I wash my sheets, I spray the mattress with Clorox Bleach to kill any bed bugs and it has helped keep the mattress smelling great without the scabies lol! For this price you can't beat it. Even if you got this for a guest bedroom or something, your guests would be more than pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Bugs Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Good product for price.
customer_reviews.text: I like it. I think if I had gotten the 12" I would love it. This is comfortable, and for the price is a great product and I would recommend. I bought the 10" based on the firmness chart, but wish I had gone with my gut and gotten the 12". This one is good....but not great. I am not crazy disappointed...the price is great and compared to the $899 mattress we were going to get, I am very satisfied. It unpacked very well, and no smell like some reviews noted. I sleep well on it, and don't notice my husband rolling around in the night. I would recommend this before spending a fortune on a name brand mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after loooooots of research and glad that I was not wrong. Had backache most of the days with previous memory foam mattress and it was getting hot many nights. In this new mattress, i dont feel any heat during night(even in summer) and also my backache is gone. Even my wife suggested she sleeps better now. So we both are very glad with this purchase and will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Boyzclub

customer_reviews.title: It's as stated,  squishy and not for someone who needs firm support
customer_reviews.text: It's OK? I use it on my hospital bed. As for that, it keeps sliding off the side which I'm certain it wouldn't do if on a regular box spring or solid surface. It's not as cool as I expected, but not hot either! It's way easier to pick up and move because of the edging, piping. You can grab hold of that and it's way lighter than a solid foam floppy mattress. It has a bit of structure. I would definitely buy this for a replacement mattress in a heart beat for bunk beds etc. As a main everyday or night mattress, no. Good deal though.
customer_reviews.author: B. Gill

customer_reviews.title: 3 months of good sleep so far!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I got the 10in king. This is an affordable, comfortable mattress. We had a tempurpedic, years took it's toll. We went to a mattress store, got a 800.00 mattress (kept tempurpedic box springs), broke down, rutting within months and they didn't do anything about it...our backs were in crisis. I read reviews on the internet and Amazon, pulled the trigger on this one and we love it! Now we are going to get one for our travel trailer...we just spent a week in it and have been missing this mattress...we look forward to good sleep tonight. I don't feel the cooling effect, but we out a protective mattress pad over it.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki H

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy...
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money. The life span of this mattress is one year. After that you’ll have a saggy mattress with no support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Firm but soft
customer_reviews.text: Only had it a few months but so far its best mattress I have ever slept on. I used to sleep about 7 - 7.5 hours a night and always woke before my alarm but since i got this mattress i sleep 8 - 8.5 hours and alarm has to actually do its job now. Its firm enough to alleviate minor back pain yet soft enough to be very comfortable. The inner coils (or whatever they are) keep it firm while the thin layer of foam (feels like about 1.5 - 2 inches thick) provides the soft comfort.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: We really like this mattress
customer_reviews.text: We really like this mattress. We had purchased the queen 8” several months ago, but decided we needed a king! We decided to get the 10”, and like it better. Our daughter and her husband got our queen, and love it! Both mattresses were easy to open and set up. I did both myself, and I am 58, and was in physical therapy for neck and shoulder problems! I am heavy, and female. Hope that answers your questions.
customer_reviews.author: Benny Bugs

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny and Then Some!
customer_reviews.text: My hubs and I struggle to get out of bed in the morning since buying our mattress! It's so comfortable and for the first time in years Hubs hasn't once complained about his back hurting! Everyone who has laid on it has instantly melted into it and can't get over the price vs value! I paid about $26 extra buck for one day shipping and was surprised to have it delivered before 11am the next day! I was a little apprehensive initially about buying a bed I'd never even tried out, but have ZERO regrets...Except I should have purchased it sooner! Plus, it rocks knowing that we supported a small, American manufacturer!
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Delivered a few days late, but the mattress itself is very good. It has only been a week or so though. Replacing a higher price inner spring I was never overly happy with, would occasionally wake up sore from sleeping in wrong position. Saw the price and had a few friends recommend foam mattresses, so thought I give it a shot. Glad i did actually. Sleeping much more comfortably. Haven't encountered any 'wrong position' soreness. Mattress takes a little over a full day or so to plump up. There was no odor but i did leave a window open just in case. Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: subsmom

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you want a soft mattress, it costs way to much to return.
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, it's soft. We looked at so many it became confusing. Trying to find size, height and firmness. It's way to soft for us. It's also way to expensive to ship back once it's out of the vacuum packed bag. It's exactly as advertised, no issues there. Just make sure you can sleep on a soft foam mattress. We can't, our mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I expected her to not be pleased with anything else
customer_reviews.text: I did so much research before I bought this bed that my eyes are still bleeding!! My daughter has a Casper twin and wanted a full. I did not want to spend the money on a new Casper so I looked for a different option. Knowing she wanted what she wanted, I expected her to not be pleased with anything else! Believe it or not, my grumpy 17 year old loves it. It is a little softer than her Casper but other then that comparable and I saved over 500.00 bucks. Only con is it never made it to 10 inches, it is about 9 1/2. I will update if it does not hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Woodstockjim

customer_reviews.title: Surprised
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical on the all foam bed in a box and then this arrived. It inflated quickly, didn't smell, and is firm! I didn't expect foam to be this firm, and there's no sagging on the edge. I'm at 225 lbs. and the mattress has no issue, doesn't move when I do, and I haven't had any heat issue even though I'm usually pretty temperature sensitive. I've had this for a month and will update at 6.
customer_reviews.author: thunder

customer_reviews.title: Causing a lot a lot a lot of back pain | Sweating on back during night time.
customer_reviews.text: Overall not happy with this mattresses. I already bought one Queen size long time ago which was awesome in all the factors, I bought this new King size thinking it will be the same and will give same comfort but this New King size one is not good at all. Causing lot of Sweating on back during night time. Causing lot of back pain. Not comfortable for seating on bed as well. I am not sure what can i do now with this now, may be i am going to talk to dealer/suppler, hope they will help me with. Overall i feel like i spent almost $400 on this but its not worth it. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: JMD_Rocks

customer_reviews.title: Middle of the bed is fine, edges are like a 20 year old mattress!
customer_reviews.text: The bed is 9 inches thick not 10 as advertised. The edges have way less fill than the middle of the bed so there is hill in the middle that you continually roll off towards the edges. The bed size falls short of a queen and is about 1 1/2 inches shorter than other queens that I own that are a standard 60x80. The sheets look pathetic and there are gaps around the bed frame. This one will be going back. Let's see how I am going to get this shrunken up and into the box!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: Not good to buy for everyday use. We bought in June, started noticing in march of the next year that it was sagged where we sleep and firm in the middle in between us. There is a big enough difference that it's hard to even roll over or lay next to each other. We have now flipped it so we lay where our feet where but don't expect it to last much longer. We are looking into purchasing a tuft and needle instead. For the price lasting 9/10 months isn't terrible HOWEVER I would recommend for a guest bed hat doesn't get frequent use or as a mattress for a camper
customer_reviews.author: Ray R.

customer_reviews.title: Seemed very nice at first
customer_reviews.text: Seemed very nice at first, but only took 2-3 months for the mattress’ top layers to poof up, separate & sag. Has ABSOLUTELY NO COOLING features AT ALL. Way too soft, I can literally almost feel the bottom of the mattress or begin to feel the top of the box spring when I stand or lean with one hand on this mattress. Not to mention, the fabric material tends to get those tiny specks of trapped lint balls all over it, making it look and feel messy and dirty. DO NOT RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: Pudge The Fudge

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you weigh 180 lbs, too hard if you weigh 112 lbs.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good mattress especially considering the price. My husband absolutely loves it. He weighs 180 lbs and the mattress is perfectly comfortable for him. He enjoys the cool feel - it really works. I weigh 112 lbs and for me the mattress is a bit too firm, I'm just not heavy enough to sink into the foam deep enough and it seems a little hard. It's hard enough to sleep on my stomach, but I'm a side sleeper so I wake up a little achy. We ended up putting a 3" memory foam topper on it and now it's perfect for me, although my husband misses the cooling gel feel.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I've had this bed for about 2 months now and can tell you my back no longer is in pain when I get up in the morning which is definitely a plus makes it worth purchasing. Having slept on a spring mattress w/2 in. foam topper before getting this bed I'd still toss and turn at night and wake up with lower back pain. I'd say this mattress is way better for me and the husband loves it too. I did however expect it to be "cooling" in some way from the description, but it wasn't until I purchased better sheets than I already had.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: RV Short Queen - also works for guest bed
customer_reviews.text: So although this is a RV short Queen and it will be put in our camper eventually, at first we’re using it on a queen frame with a sheet of plywood for my parents who are staying with us for a few weeks. About 3 weeks in and they love it. Mother gave the 5 stars ⭐️.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: I've seen it down around $80 and I should've bought 3 back then because this is seriously one fine mattress! It took less than 1
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mattress when the price was around $250. I've seen it down around $80 and I should've bought 3 back then because this is seriously one fine mattress! It took less than 10 minutes to self inflate, and despite my bloodhound nose I've never detected a whiff of off-gassing that is common with new foam bedding. My wife is a Princess and the Pea type, and she still is praising its' comfort 2 weeks after setting it up. It is a medium firm mattress that stays comfortably cool even under a down comforter. It gives support whether I'm sleeping on my back or my side. Best mattress deal for the price I've ever encountered!
customer_reviews.author: "rcpena"

customer_reviews.title: Its nice for a few nights and what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I am updating this post after having this mattress for about a year. This mattress ended up wearing and getting extremely soft. It did not cradle our pressure points and ended up giving me and my husband back problems. For a few nights, this mattress is great, but not good for long term. We have moved this into our spare bedroom and invested in the Leesa mattress. It has only been one night, but we can already tell the difference in our sleep. For the first time in a long time, I slept all the way through the night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very strange lumpiness
customer_reviews.text: The mattress didn't puff up when I opened it like other memory foam mattresses. I'm assuming it's almost 9" but doubtful 10". It is incredibly lumpy. When I put my fitted sheet on it, it looks like a small pillow or pillows are trapped underneath. It's pretty comfortable but way more soft than I had expected. Overall I wish I had ordered a different product. If I could return it I would, but how do you get it back in a small box?
customer_reviews.author: joyce

customer_reviews.title: Elderly, chronic pain suffering, BBW approved
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a guest bed. It arrived on time when I unrolled it etc it did inflate though at first it didn't seem like it would inflate fully. I was very skeptical of this purchase but for a last minute purchase for guests I was sure it has to beat sleeping on the floor. My mom came and stayed with me unexpectedly for several months. She's over 300lbs and reported consistently that it was a very comfortable mattress for her. It still looks like it didn't quite inflate, especially around the edges where it looks a little lopsided. She did say it was comfortable though and she's a big lady.
customer_reviews.author: Sussie

customer_reviews.title: Glad I found this on Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2, 10-inch thick, long twin mattresses to replace a single standard king, for ease of transport & setup. I do not use a strap to hold the twin mattresses together, but I do have a mattress topper & the mattresses rest on a plywood-topped captain's bed with two levels of drawers . Prompt delivery. Exceptional price. Very comfortable. My wife is very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Regular Guy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: I returned this mattress after one week, it was wildly hot and didn't fit the memory foam feel to me. I was adamant about having a Made in America memory foam mattress and that limited me greatly but with such great reviews I gave it a whirl. It came as described and didn't smell much at all, I set it up solo. I still wonder if there was something wrong with the one I received since my experience didn't match the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie138

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable mattress
customer_reviews.text: I love this mattress. It is very comfortable. Not too soft, not too firm. I chose this hybrid mattress over the gel foam because it does have springs. I researched many mattresses and read many reviews before choosing this particular one. I was skeptical ordering a mattress online, but so happy I did. Right out of the box it inflated in a matter of minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Clemons

customer_reviews.title: Bad purchase. Don't waste your
customer_reviews.text: Fits nice in freightliner... Just dont sleep on it soft as can be. Sink down like a I-80 pothole. Makes it hard to sleep hot as can be. Good for cold weather. 40 out no need for heat. Read reviews before buying I did not. Don't waste your money. Factory bed better.
customer_reviews.author: BWS

customer_reviews.title: Best mattress and awesome price
customer_reviews.text: Hands down these mattresses are great. I own 3! Bought one for my daughter, son loved it so I got him one with platform bed from here on Amazon. I tried both and after a few months I bought a third for my vacation home. Two are daily use and over a year old. No dips or anything. Not too hot either and I cook easy. I simply don't know why anyone would but anything else. My personal bed is 3 years old but will be this in a king for sure. I've spent thousands in mattresses before including a top brand memory foam cool top but why when this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Turner

customer_reviews.title: DONT PURCHASE THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT PURCHASE THIS PRODUCT!!!!!! I can’t stress it enough! I bought a twin few years (2/3) ago and it has been such a lifesaver for my back pain so now that I am moving and I will have the space I wanted a queen. The sides never puffed up so I contacted customer service for a replacement .. this time it puffed up quicker and more than the other but the ends (top and bottom of mattress) once again will not puff up!!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha graves

customer_reviews.title: This mattress is just GREAT! Got it in a pinch for my mother's ...
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is just GREAT! Got it in a pinch for my mother's winter visit, and she loved it so much, that she wants one for her home. It's a trip to get a box, that holds a rolled up mattress. Once you cut the plastic it immediately starts to expand, and I mean quickly. Unlike the old vaccuum sealed mattresses, this one had no smell at all! Mom has gone home but I'm now sleeping on it instead of my normal bed. I'm 360 pounds, and it doesn't crush like the cheap brands, but instead holds my weight well! Its really 10 inches thick too! I'm planning on getting a king sized version and replacing my old mattress soon.
customer_reviews.author: stef the chef

customer_reviews.title: This mattress is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed! The first week owning this bed I had to avoid laying on it to watch tv as I would end up falling asleep. My husband has a job that is hard on his back. He was in constant pain. Since getting this bed he feels so much better. I never realized just how horrible our old mattress was until I got this one. I am trying to convince my dad to purchase one as well. He has a bad back due to years as a mechanic. I may just buy it for them as he just bought another one somewhere else that he hates. The price is too amazing to pass up.
customer_reviews.author: OneNuttyMama

customer_reviews.title: Can’t stand up to 200 lb man
customer_reviews.text: Loved this mattress for the first year! Now 2 1/2 years in and the mattress has lost all support on my husbands side. My side is fine but I weigh 1/2 of what my husband does at 115 lbs. I have to wonder if this mattress just can’t support the weight of 200 lbs. So now we are searching for a new mattress.
customer_reviews.author: John Dufal

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t have very high expectations for this mattress because it came flat and in fairly small box. Boy, was I wrong!! It’s is so comfortable that I volunteered to sleep in the guest room!
customer_reviews.author: Schiznic

customer_reviews.title: A MADE IN USA WINNER.....
customer_reviews.text: This is the 4th purchased; two queen and two full for relatives, self, and as gift. The made in USA was a HUGE draw for me. All four that have received these, some almost year gone by, to several months to recent, all love them and thought were a big improvement over the mattresses they had (some were almost new mattresses they were sleeping on already). I would DEFINITELY buy again and if past experience is any measure, will in the future. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: dgr

customer_reviews.title: MAGIC
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed when the mattress arrived, because the box was so small, I thought, "what have I done", but it was like magic. I took it out of the box, and then the wrap, and laid it on the frame, and it begin to grow. It is a beautiful mattress, with thickness, firmness and softness, all wrapped into one. When you lay on it, you are floating. Very pleasantly surprised with this find. My overnight guests love it.
customer_reviews.author: Elva in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Sweet dream at last
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item for a 350+ pounder plus person with bad back. She has tried several mattresses over the years and all of them gave her at best a few days rest. Since receiving this a month ago she has slept longer and sounder. The bed stays cools as she gets warm easy. She has told.several people about the mattress. This is a double size artic mattress on a metal frame bought at kmart. We will be purchasing to replace our children's mattress over the next few months.
customer_reviews.author: PF007

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easily moved. Very slight smell quickly dissipated with a ...
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and easily moved. Very slight smell quickly dissipated with a fan and open window in a couple hours. I'd give it 5 stars but I thought it would be firmer. I am a back sleeper and a firm mattress is suggested from what I read. You can easily compress the mattress all the way down by sitting on the edge or pushing down with your hand. However, if your entire body is laying on it, it does support well. best part is when I turn on my side no more shoulder soreness. The mattress absorbs bends and protrusions from your body very well.
customer_reviews.author: B.E.

customer_reviews.title: The Most comfortable bed on the market exspecially if you have a bad back
customer_reviews.text: I just have to say that these beds are unbelievable, I have had many beds in my life and the one before this costed us 3,000.00 And it was terrible, I have had my dream foam bed for 2 years now and it's still the same when i bought it, 3 of my friends have also boughten these beds and they love them. So I give this bed 5 stars from my personal experience
customer_reviews.author: BaitShopOwner

customer_reviews.title: Too firm
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is too firm, even with our 2" cotton "cuddle" topper. Do we now have to buy a gel foam mattress pad to put under the mattress topper? Dreamfoam company rates this 10" mattress as "medium" on their firmness scale. It seems much firmer than that. 2 years ago, we purchased an Arctic Dreams 10" Cooling Gel Mattress in a short queen from Amazon.com for our rv. We loved it. It was sink-in comfort. We thought this king purchase would be similar. NOT!! Quite disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Quality not as good as it was
customer_reviews.text: I’m disappointed in the firmness of the sides of this bed. You can literally feel where the firmness changes. It’s so bad that I can’t sit on the side to put on my shoes bc it will throw me in the floor. I have bought this mattress in a king and still very satisfied with that one. I feel like the quality has definitely changed. My bff bought a queen after being on my king and hers does not have this issue. Really sad that the quality has gone down hill.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: Not the Arctic Dream we want to dream about every night
customer_reviews.text: We have two arctic dreams 10" cooling gel mattresses. A twin and a queen both of which we love. So when we upgraded our queen bed to a king we were excited to order another one. The king mattress IS NOT the same as the other sizes. It is too firm and uncomfortable to sleep on. No telling what is involved to return it, unfortunately we may just be out the money because we definitely have to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: michele e.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mattress for a great price
customer_reviews.text: We have a cal king mattress we got on sale for *only* $1300, and my husband thinks this arctic dreams mattress is more comfortable than that one. We got it to go in our nursery spare bed as we get ready for a baby, and at times this mattress is the only thing saving me at night as it provides adequate support for my growing/lopsided pregnant body and is still extremely comfortable. I am completely thrilled with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Not actually cool
customer_reviews.text: I've had this mattress since 2016 and just remembered I hate it during non-winter months because retains heat for too long... It was fine when I didn't have a partner, but the combined heat + non-winter = too hot; unbearable; I'm in the search for a new mattress now and am scarred from ever wanting to buy another memory foam type mattress again. If a "cooling gel" memory foam mattress isn't actually cool, then a memory foam can't be cool
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Bearski

customer_reviews.title: So so comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It's like laying on air. Cool, comfortable and easy to set up. I put it where I wanted it and then opened the wrapping. It immediately started to expand. I did not notice a strong smell that you used to get with these mattresses. Even my husband has not complained about it, - if he could he would!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: NO MORE ACHING BACK !
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS MATTRESS! I too was skeptical about the cheap price at $359. and buying a mattress on line. We've been sleeping on it for a few weeks and it is wonderful. We don't wake up with aching backs anymore. It's super comfy. The only thing I do NOT notice is the "cooling gel" top. Other than that - terrific purchase, absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: SuzyQ

customer_reviews.title: Love my mattress.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this mattress for our guest room at the same time we were within a 100 day trial period with two twin XL foam mattresses for the master (another more expensive brand). I was finding my side of the bed too firm so tried out Arctic Dreams mattress in our guest room. Immediately slept better and woke without shoulders hurting. I've since ordered an Arctic Dream twin XL for the master and am returning my original mattress. Both mattresses (queen and twin XL) came quickly, expanded right away with barely any noticeable odor. Would definitely recommend if you need a little more give in your mattress. Also, price can't be beat!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress to add on to a Queen size bed to create a super bed so myself, my partner, dogs, and cat could all fit in one bed. I didn't want to spend a lot of money incase my plan didn't work. This mattress had pretty good reviews, so I thought I would give it a try. I had pretty low expectation because our Queen mattress is an expensive one. I love this mattress! I typically sleep on the side of the bed that has this mattress because I find it even more comfortable than our Beauty Rest mattress. If you're looking for a less expensive alternative to a name brand mattress, I would highly recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: GDCarlee

customer_reviews.title: Softer than hoped for.
customer_reviews.text: At first, I was mistakenly sent the 8" mattress, instead of the 10" I ordered. After a quick word with customer service, the correct mattress was delivered with all speed. I was even able to keep the 8" mattress, which I gave to a friend in need. After a few weeks of sleeping on it, I've found that it's a bit softer than I expected and I wake up feeling a little stiff. However, it usually takes me a month or so to adjust to a new mattress; I'll update this review when I've had more time to test it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Osborne Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Initial opening.
customer_reviews.text: We received this at our door in a large box. We took it to the RV and opened the box and put it on the bed. Initially I was skeptical because it looked like it would not open up. We left it a couple of days and then went to check, what a really nice mattress! I laid on it for a while and it is very comfortable. Have not slept yet so I will add that to the review later.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Nofire

customer_reviews.title: Best mattress eva!
customer_reviews.text: I was reluctant to buy a gel foam mattress online. I bought a king hybrid Mattress at Bob's discount furniture for $1500. This queen mattress for my RV is more comfortable and no bed sweats. No more back pain. I am 300 lbs and my wife is 100 lbs. We both sleep so good on this mattress and truly feel rested.
customer_reviews.author: GJ

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL MATTRESS!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got this for a wedding present from my husband and I. She says this mattress is absolute perfection. She did order a pillow top to go with it as she had read some of the reviews. The combination is unbelievably comfortable. She says it's the best bed EVER! She got this topper/pad  and this liner/protector.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Woodrum

customer_reviews.title: Nice Mattress, Comfortable with NO UNPLEASANT ODOR!
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a great mattress, as with most foam mattresses it arrives compressed. It expanded quickly and seems very comfortable. The most unusual aspect is, that there is NO objectionable odor, if you are familiar with memory foam mattresses or pillows you know the smell. This mattress is almost odor free, right out of the packaging. It is for our daughter's room and she is away at school, so can't rate it's overnight comfort. So far, we are very happy customers and would recommend this mattress. We purchased this mattress with They seem to work well together
customer_reviews.author: Iggy

customer_reviews.title: DreamFoam made for an ideal waterbed mattress replacement.
customer_reviews.text: We have been sleeping on a California King waterbed for 25+ years, and it was past time for a change. The 10-inch Cal King mattress from DreamFoam was a perfect replacement for the waterbed mattress, and let us keep our waterbed frame with all of its integral storage. The mattress has been very comfortable, and both my wife and I have been getting a better night's sleep. We have been so pleased that when our two kids wanted to replace their traditional mattresses with memory foam, we made sure that they bought from DreamFoam as well. They are both very satisfied with their new beds as well.
customer_reviews.author: Digger

customer_reviews.title: Never puffed up properly
customer_reviews.text: Mattress did not inflate properly...a big ball of foam puffed up in the middle but all the edges stayed flat, left it unrolled for 3 days until I decided to return it. Amazon customer service was terrible, I don't think I even spoke to someone in America. Sounded like they were in a crowded basement on speaker phone.
customer_reviews.author: rbnclmn

customer_reviews.title: Uneven firmness- Utter disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the same exact 10" Cooling Gel Mattress ( a Full XL) that I purchased in 2016. I was very impressed with the comfort and the price. The old mattress is still very comfortable. However, I recently upgraded to this King size and I am thoroughly disappointed. It looks identical to the old one, but it doesnt feel anything like the same mattress. It's extremely firm on one half, and slightly less firm on the other half. Its nearly impossible to find a comfortable position for your back. Ive slept on air mattresses from Walmart that are more comfortable than this bed.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: So very pleased with my new bed!
customer_reviews.text: What a comfortable, well-made mattress. I've needed to replace my old mattress for years and I am So glad I chose this brand as the replacement. It's very well made, packaged well and it was a breeze to set up. Just be sure that you have the rolled-up mattress in place before you start dealing with the plastic wrapper or, like me, you'll be rushing with a slowly expanding mattress towards your box spring. Silly me! The good news is that I'm sleeping like a baby and I wake up feeling rested, with none of the aches that I had when sleeping on my 22+ year-old mattress. Thank you, Dreamfoam Bedding!
customer_reviews.author: Teri from NY

customer_reviews.title: I thouroughly enjoy sleeping on this dream foam
customer_reviews.text: I thouroughly enjoy sleeping on this dream foam. It took two days to adjust as I always have slept on a spring mattress and honestly thought i would not like it. I wake with no aches or pains. I did with a regular spring mattress. I am fully rested. I Will never go back to owning a spring mattress again. I appreciate this opportunity to let you all know that I am 100% sold. For anyone that desires to rest well get the dream foam, money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer hartt

customer_reviews.title: Who let Goldielocks in here?
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is awesome! This is my first memory foam matress, and I think I made the perfect choice. Its not too firm, not too soft. When you put full weight in a small area, the foam completely crumples, so don't expect firm edges. I'd describe it as medium to medium-firm. But when you lay down with your weight evenly distributed... It's glorious! Your body sinks in just a small amount, which is perfect. I'm not sure what to say about the cooling gel feature, as there hasn't yet been warm enough weather to see if it does what it's supposed to do in that context. Overall, this is an excellent mattress for the price.
customer_reviews.author: The Mrs.

customer_reviews.title: Much too hit!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is so hot it feels as though I am lying on a bed of hot coals Which makes it impossible to get a full nights sleep. Also, the mattress is coming apart at the seams and is impossible to repair.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper C

customer_reviews.title: ... should buy one for myself since her's is really nice and soft
customer_reviews.text: My sister has this mattress so I thought I should buy one for myself since her's is really nice and soft, and I have to replace my 5 year old mattress anyway. It is very comfortable, and true to size, the only reason why I deducted 1 star from it is since I have a metal bed frame (unlike my sister's who has wood slats) mine is a bit firmer than hers. I am not totally sure if it is because of the metal frame I have, but still overall, it's a really nice, comfortable mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Rio

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: So here is my good and bad breakdown for this mattress: Good: -Its true to size. -Expanded to full size in about 20min -Did not have the awful chemical smell normally associated with foam mattresses -Ridiculously comfortable. I could easily compare this to a $3k tempur mattress. Bad: -I had not ordered this sooner
customer_reviews.author: MasonM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price, amazing sleep
customer_reviews.text: After using it for a few months, I am absolutely in love with this mattress. It still looks and feels like new (I know this because I tried out my friend's, who bought this same mattress just a few days ago). There have been no dips or bends, the edges keep their shape, and it manages heat incredibly well. This is a steal for the price, get it while it's still discounted! It came rolled up and vacuum sealed, but it took it's original shape within a few hours and I was sleeping on it the same night. No odors either.
customer_reviews.author: Aamir Husain

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Made in the USA!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this mattress for our spare bedroom. The report from our first guest is that that mattress is superb. I like that the top of the mattress seems to have a layer of quilted material so that it feels less hot and sticky than sleeping directly on memory foam. Consider us impressed by the quality and price on this mattress. I was very much attracted by the fact it is made in the USA. We purchased another brand of import mattress before and it stank like chemicals for weeks! This one came out of the bag smelling fresh and was ready to sleep on within hours.
customer_reviews.author: venturaguy

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is my first foam mattress and I am impressed with the quality and the value. The price is reasonable. Delivery was fast. The product was as described. I agree that it is very helpful in alleviating pressure points, and don't need additional cushion personally. It's much better than the innerspring that I had; however it was not a pillowtop, which might be a different experience. I would buy it again and would recommend this company for the product and service. 3 years - the mattress is still comfortable. However, it is not cooling in my opinion. Seems to be inherent for foam mattress.
customer_reviews.author: B. Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality mattress
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in July 2016, at first I thought it was great, but now after 9 months, it is as hard as a rock, and hurting my back terribly. I'm very disappointed with the quality of this product. I do not recommend this at all.
customer_reviews.author: myvonne

customer_reviews.title: Comfort, quality and great price!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this bed for our 2 year old daughter, we didn't want to buy anything way over budget so we decided to go with this mattress. This has been one of the best purchases that we have made!! Our daughter loves her mattress!! And to be honest I love it too! I mean, we never expected it to be so comfortable!! We were truly blown away with the quality and comfort provided. I personally recommend this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Gonsal2008

customer_reviews.title: No odor, excellent comfort!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with speedy shipment of mattress, and LOVED seeing the huge American Flag on the shipping box, with MADE IN THE USA proudly displayed beneath the flag. Awesome. So glad to support an AMERICAN Company, wish I could buy thousands more of these mattresses, very comfortable, and NO odor or off-gassing. Simple to unpack, and puffed up in minutes. Wonderful wonderful wonderful. Jesus loves you!
customer_reviews.author: Bry-Rit

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress, Great price, Great Service.
customer_reviews.text: The mattress is amazing, I was at first concerned with the fact it came in a box, I guess I missed that part in school. I was skeptical, it was small and very tight, and not that heavy. The box arrived fine, the interior packaging was all plastic wrap. I was worried about cutting the mattress, use scissors and be careful. It popped out greatly, and quickly. It is surprisingly firm, on the corners and the edges. Its a wonder to sleep on. It is the best value for the price, no matter. The Amazon Delivery made it so much easier to the door, why do it anyway else?
customer_reviews.author: William Dunne Jr

customer_reviews.title: Garbage, do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Good for the first few months, after that it becomes unbearable. Company wants you to send hundreds of pictures of this and that, and measure the changes, all kinds of proof of their garbage product is "defective" as if they don't already know it. I don't have time for that nonsense. Absolutely do NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: A. burns

product_meta.title: Arctic Dreams 10" Cool to The Touch Gel Infused Memory Foam Mattress, Made in The USA- Full XL
product_meta.description:
Size:full_xl| Style Name:Cooling Gel MattressEnjoy a cooler and more comfortable nights sleep with our Arctic Dreams 10" Cooling Gel mattress with quick response gel infused memory foam. Our Arctic Dreams memory foam mattress utilizes an advanced visco-elastic foam called energy. While a typical visco memory foam mattresses will have slow recovery time, Energex provides a quick response alternative that bridges the gap between traditional visco and latex material. Its highly open, cool and responsive polymer structure is designed to offer a superior alternative to latex or springs while providing the outstanding pressure point relief properties that you will find in visco. The Arctic Dreams 10" Cooling Gel mattress with quick response gel infused memory foam mattress features 2.5 inches of fast response Energex gel memory foam on top of 7.5 inches of convoluted high-density polyurethane foam and covered with .75 inches of a soft Quilting layer. Although this mattress is not cool to the touch, It will help to regulate your body heat temperature throughout the night. Put this all together and you have an unparalleled combination of comfort and support to give you A great night's sleep. Please allow up to 24 hours for your mattress to fully expand and any potential odors to dissipate.
our DreamFoam mattresses are made in our local USA factory, using the highest quality materials. Our personal approach to designing, stitching and crafting backed by a generous 10-year no hassle Warranty. 
certi-pur certified, which means that our mattress is made without ozone depletes, PBDEs, TDCPP or TCEP ("Tris") flame retardants, mercury, lead, heavy metals, formaldehyde or phthalates regulated by the Consumer Product Safety Commission.
feature_bullets: Offered in a universal medium comfort level, the Arctic Dreams is constructed with a .75” ultra-soft quilted top for plush, breathable comfort. The top is designed to resist body impressions over time.
A patented 2” layer of Energex foam bridges the gap between latex and visco-memory foam, combining all the responsiveness of latex with the pressure point relief of memory foam.
A surface gel cooling infusion delivers a more comfortable night’s sleep while a 7.5” high-density core contributes to durability and longevity.
Compressed and rolled for easy and convenient parcel shipping and set-up. Please allow up to 24 hours for your mattress to expand and potential odor to dissipate.
10-year warranty, proudly made in the USA, CertiPUR-US certified.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars2,770 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
